General.Name: Odyssey Marine Exploration Inc
General.Description: Odyssey Marine Exploration, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, discovers, validates, and develops seafloor mineral resources worldwide. The company provides specialized mineral exploration, project development, and marine services to clients. Odyssey Marine Exploration, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Tampa, Florida.
General.Address: 205 South Hoover Boulevard, Tampa, FL, United States, 33609
